about_the_game:
The Builder

Help him impregnate a town full of women

In The Builder, you play the role of a skilled young man who is commissioned to build a memorial in a village in the far north.

Soon you discover that your real task is quite different: In order to save the village from extinction, you must make all the women there pregnant.

The Builder is a choice based visual novel game. It has a clear and engaging storyline and a rich cast of characters. Get ready for an experience out of the ordinary.

We follow the main character through a full year of work - all the way to the completion of the memorial - and the successful breeding of the women of the village.

The Builder is a sophisticated adult visual novel, now in its second season.

Season 2

Season 2 picks up directly after Season 1, and you continue your quest to save the village, one impregnation at the time.

A total of 6 seasons (30 episodes) are planned. The story is currently near the closing of Season 2, and by purchasing the early release, you have a season pass, including the last episode of Season 2 as soon as it is released.

Support the development

If you want to support the development of The Builder, you can wishlist all the seasons here on Steam.

content_descriptors.notes: Intercourse, oral sex, mild BDSM, impregnation, group sex, voyeurism. Fetish content is clearly marked and can be skipped.

detailed_description:
Release update

The Builder is currently in the approval queue by the Steam/Valve teem, and we are hoping to release soon!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: irectX® 9 compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU capable of showing images
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9 compatible

name: The Builder - Season 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: irectX® 9 compatible

short_description: The story continues with season 2 of the popular adult visual novel The Builder. Our hero needs to deepen his relations with the women of the small community in order to advance his build. Not all goes as planned. Uknowingly, he starts his true mission: To get all the women pregnant.
